post.text:
Donald Trump agreed to release his tax returns if he ran for office.

Now? "It's none of your business." What's he hiding?

comment.author: Micah
comment.text: he knows the American public won't like what it sees if he releases them, that's way--simple!

replies.author: Tomas
replies.text: Lol Micah the AMERICAN PUBLIC does not like what it sees with Hillary, a lying, unethical, incompetent, loud mouth who will say or do anything to get elected

replies.author: Bethany
replies.text: Micah . You are perpetrating a conspiracy theory. What, no facts?
